aboutDescription: #defyhatenow Ethiopia is a peacebuilding initiative working to counter hate speech, mis/disinformation, and incitement to violence through civic engagement and digital literacy. Our goal is in Meraja Mahder is to strengthen democratic, secure and civil digital space in Ethiopia. We work with youth, women, educators, journalists, policymakers, civil society organizations, and grassroots communities to strengthen media literacy, fact-checking skills, and conflict prevention efforts in Ethiopia.
